channel.title: I forgot my wallet provider and can't find m money
channel.description:
My system has the following specifications
QT Wallet, Client Wallet (and version) or Web wallet: Operating System and version: If web wallet browser name and version: If desktop wallet (Qt or Client) block # of your client and # of connections:
The problem I am having is ....I Computer crashed. Forgot wallet provider. Have bitcoin address and QR code. How do I find my money.

item.title: I forgot my wallet provider and can't find m money
item.dc:creator: @tradersnow
item.description:
@tradersnow wrote:

Just to confirm, is your issue with a Bitcoin address, or a BitBay (BAY) address? I can only help with BitBay related issues.

If it is a BitBay (BAY) address, can you post it here please?

Let me know.

Thanks,
Matt

Read full topic
